com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model

Interface ICategory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAuditable, IAuditableHandle, ICategoryHandle, IItem, IItemHandle, IManagedItem, IManagedItemHandle, IProjectScoped

    public interface ICategory
extends ICategoryHandle, IAuditable, IProjectScoped
    A category of work items. Categories are organized in a tree within each project area and represent functional areas of different granularity. For each development line a category is owned by a team which determines the process used for work items filed against that category. A work item's development line is given by the iteration it is planned for. If a work item is not planned for an iteration the default team area's process is used.
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    IWorkItem.getCategory(), IWorkItem.getTarget(), IWorkItemCommon.findProcessArea(IWorkItemHandle, IProgressMonitor)

      • getAssociatedTeamAreas

        java.util.List<ITeamAreaHandle> getAssociatedTeamAreas()
        Returns the list of associated team areas. There should be only one team area for each development line, but this can currently not be enforced.
        Returns:
        the list of associated team areas

      • getDefaultTeamArea

        ITeamAreaHandle getDefaultTeamArea()
        Returns the default team area that is used when a work item is not planned for an iteration.
        This method may throw IllegalStateException exception if the setDefaultTeamArea() was not called.
        The isSetDefaultTeamArea() should be used first to avoid the exception.
        Returns:
        the default team area

      • isSetDefaultTeamArea

        boolean isSetDefaultTeamArea()
        Returns:
        true if the default team area was set for the category.

      • isFiltered

        boolean isFiltered()
        Returns true if the category should be hidden from contributors not part of any associated team in the category subtree.
        Returns:
        true if the category should be hidden from unaffiliated contributors

        Returns:
